title: Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup: Fruits & Vegetables", ca. 1970
medium: Pen and colored inks, brush and watercolor, varnish on bright white paper, taped to a sheet of bright white paper
description: Semicircular sheet with two registers of brightly colored stylized fruits and vegetables that conform to the shape of the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup: Fruits & Vegetables", ca. 1970.
ca. 1970. Pen and colored inks, brush and watercolor, varnish on bright white paper, taped to a sheet of bright white paper. Gift of Irv Koons. 2011-1-9.
